Articles.Content:
Hey,

I decided to play KSP after 1 years not playing and when I create/load a save the planet is all pink.

I tried at first to uninstall the game using steam and then dowloading it again so it should be a clean version of the game, but the issue is still here, then I tried everything I could find :

 -checking launch options to see if opengl wasn't enabled, but it's not the case,

 -I updated my drivers,

 -running the game as administrator,

 -using the verify integrity of game file feature of steam (when I use it, it says that one file is missing and starts downloading it, then I use it again to check if everything is ok, and everything is ok. I launch the game try to load a save, it's still pink. I exit the game, I use the feature and it says that, again one file is missing)

 -I also disabled anti-aliasing

 

Some screenshots :

- When I launch the game it's all fine : http://prntscr.com/eacmk3

- when I load a save, notice that the loading animation is already pink : http://prntscr.com/eacmy9

- when I'm in-game : http://prntscr.com/eacnaf

- when leave that game to go back to the main menu : http://prntscr.com/eacnpn

 

The link for the log file : https://www.dropbox.com/s/4af5tcobzllrdgv/output_log.txt?dl=0

 

My DxDiag if you need it : https://www.dropbox.com/s/1u7c3p6bvnnthg4/DxDiag.txt?dl=0

I'm using windows 8 and running KSP on v 1.2.2.

 

 

Thanks for your help, if you need something else let me know.

Hi @NakedRussian, it appears you are using scatterer, this is likely the cause of your issue.

Quote 

Mod DLLs found:

scatterer v1.0.5594.4540

Folders and files in GameData:
scatterer


************************************************************************

[AddonLoader]: Instantiating addon 'Core' from assembly 'scatterer'

TypeLoadException: Could not load type 'RenderingManager' from assembly 'scatterer'.

Scatterer is throwing errors, I suggest you update it or remove it

Thanks it's working, I thought uninstalling the game and then downloading it again would uninstall any mod.

 

thanks again
Back when I played on a laptop, re-entry effects turned the ship hot pink. The problems may be somewhat related.
